summary: Loosely based on La máscara del demonio (1960), a group of skiers get lost in the mountains, and come across the snowy tomb of a centuries-old witch. They accidentally awaken the witch's vengeful spirit, who then proceeds to possess them one by one.
cast: Giovanni Guidelli|Debora Caprioglio|Stanko Molnar|Mary Sellers|Alessandra Bonarotta|Laura Devoti|Michele Soavi|Stefano Molinari|Ron Williams|Eva Grimaldi
title: La máscara del demonio
